where & when

Attire at both venues is semi formal. No jeans or denim please.

Cocktails and meals will be served at both venues. There is a drink limit.

Toronto, Canada

Ceremony and Reception

Saturday, March 3, 2018

Ceremony starts at 11:30

Photos and cocktails at 12:30

Reception at 14:00

Caffino Ristorante

1185 King St W

Toronto, ON, M6K 3C5

Weather

The weather is forecasted to be cold. Dress appropriately.

Parking

Parking is available by Fraser Avenue.

Entrance

Main entrance for the wedding is located on King street. Enter the gate under 1185 King West.

Manila, Philippines

Ceremony

Saturday, March 17, 2018

Ceremony starts at 11:00 am.

Our Lady of Lourdes Church

Tagaytay - Nasugbu Hwy,

Silang Junction North,

Tagaytay, Cavite, Philippines

Weather

Warm, with a chance for light showers.

Parking

Parking is available at the church.

Entrance

Main entrance is behind the fountain. Guests are encouraged to enter via the side entrances.

Reception

Saturday, March 17, 2018

Reception starts at 12:00 nn.

Balay Dako

Tagaytay - Nasugbu Hwy, Tagaytay,

4120 Cavite, Philippines

Weather

Warm, with a chance for light showers.

Parking

Parking is available in front of Balay Dako.

Entrance

Reception is going to be held on the second floor.

about us

Miguel

Miguel was born in Manila, and moved to Canada. He grew up surrounded by books, videogames, boardgames, and friends and family that constantly pushed him to dream about the future. One can often find Miguel quoting comic books, reading his favorite science-fiction, cooking breakfast for his family and friends, or sipping “Tea, Earl Grey, hot.”

Miguel currently works as a web developer - a profession that combines creativity, problem-solving and tenacity. He enjoys being fluent in a language that nearly everyone can see or hear - the language of the web. He dreams of the day he will walk within the cyberpunk-infused neon glow of Shinjuku or Mongkok. He enjoys removing green peas from fried rice, Shepherd’s Pie, paella, and anything else that would harbor this spherical, verdant-faced, assassin-of-joy.

Today, Miguel is surrounded by books, video games, boardgames, and friends and family that still push him to dream about the future.

Questions? You can usually find Miguel online, either in a video game, or on one of the many instant messengers that buzz around us.

  • Likes: Quiet evenings.

  • Dislikes: Noisy neighbors. (And green peas)

Yum

Yum was born in Hong Kong and grew up in Canada. She grew up in a home with libraries of books. One can often find Yum face-deep into a good read, alongside a cup of "Tea, Earl Grey, hot." Her hobbies include (but are not limited to) travelling, Playback Theater, fostering cats and crafting DIY home products.

Yum works in a profession that cares for the physical, emotional, and spiritual well being of others. Her favorite cat is named Jujube. She hates green peas so much that she will pick out every (almost) single one of them out of her fried rice.

Chat with Yum for further details.

  • Likes: Jujube, Ambassador from Planet Felis Catus

  • Dislikes: Green Peas, Scourge of Fried Rice
